WHERE CLASS_STATE NOT IN ('0')
WHERE CLASS_STATE NOT IN ('0')
WHERE CLASS_STATE = #{searchKeyword} AND CLASS_STATE NOT IN ('0')
AND CLASS_STATE = '2'
WHERE (CLASS_NO LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%' OR USER_ID LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%' OR CLASS_TITLE LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%' OR CLASS_IMAGE LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%' OR CLASS_STATE LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%' OR CLASS_INTRO LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%' OR CLASS_PRICE LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%' OR TOTAL_MONEY LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%' OR TOTAL_LESSON LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%' OR TOTAL_STUDENT LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%' OR TOTAL_STEAM LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%' OR START_DATE LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%' OR END_DATE LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%' OR CATEGORY LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%' OR KIT_NAME LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%' OR KIT_PRICE LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%' OR KIT_IMAGE LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%' OR KIT_INTRO LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%' OR CLASS_STATE LIKE '%1%' OR CLASS_STATE LIKE '%2%' OR CLASS_STATE LIKE '%3%' OR CLASS_STATE LIKE '%4%' OR CLASS_STATE LIKE '%5%' OR CLASS_STATE LIKE '%6%' OR CLASS_STATE LIKE '%7%' ) AND CLASS_STATE NOT IN ('0')
ORDER BY CLASS_NO DESC ) search_data WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum}
AND search_data.CLASS_STATE = #{category} ) WHERE no BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
